statements: SELECT * FROM charging_stations ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT location, availability FROM charging_stations WHERE availability = true;
SELECT * FROM charging_stations WHERE charging_speed > 50.0;
SELECT location, charging_speed FROM charging_stations ORDER BY charging_speed DESC;
SELECT location, availability FROM charging_stations WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT * FROM charging_stations WHERE location='New York' AND availability=true ORDER BY charging_speed DESC;
SELECT location, availability FROM charging_stations WHERE charging_speed > 5.0;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM charging_stations WHERE location LIKE '%California%';
SELECT location, charging_speed FROM charging_stations WHERE availability=true LIMIT 3 OFFSET 2;
SELECT AVG(charging_speed) AS average_speed, MAX(charging_speed) AS max_speed FROM charging_stations WHERE location='California';
SELECT * FROM charging_stations
SELECT location, charging_speed FROM charging_stations
SELECT id, availability, charging_speed FROM charging_stations WHERE location = 'New York'
SELECT * FROM station_history ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT station_id, date, status FROM station_history WHERE status = 'Active'
SELECT id, location FROM charging_stations WHERE availability = true ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT id, location, charging_speed FROM charging_stations WHERE availability = true ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT id, location, charging_speed FROM charging_stations WHERE charging_speed = 'Fast' ORDER BY id ASC
SELECT * FROM station_history WHERE date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT station_id, status FROM station_history WHERE status LIKE '%error%' ORDER BY station_id ASC
SELECT * FROM charging_station;
SELECT location, availability FROM charging_station WHERE charging_speed = 'Fast';
SELECT station_id, start_time, end_time FROM charging_history ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT owner_name, contact_number FROM station_owner WHERE owner_id = 1;
SELECT location, availability, charging_speed FROM charging_station WHERE availability = TRUE ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT location, availability FROM charging_station WHERE charging_speed = 'Fast' ORDER BY location ASC
SELECT * FROM charging_history WHERE amount_charged > 50 ORDER BY start_time DESC
SELECT owner_name, contact_number FROM station_owner WHERE owner_id = 1
SELECT * FROM charging_station WHERE availability = TRUE ORDER BY id
SELECT MAX(amount_charged) AS max_charge FROM charging_history
SELECT * FROM charging_stations;
SELECT location, availability FROM charging_stations WHERE availability = true;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%';
SELECT username, phone_number FROM users ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT session_id, record_id, charging_duration FROM charging_sessions WHERE energy_used > 50;
SELECT * FROM charging_stations ORDER BY station_id ASC, location DESC, availability ASC, charging_speed
SELECT location, availability FROM charging_stations WHERE availability = true

SELECT users.username, users.email, charging_sessions.charging_duration FROM users INNER JOIN charging_history ON users.user_id = charging_history.user_id INNER JOIN charging_sessions ON charging_history.record_id = charging_sessions.record_id
SELECT * FROM charging_stations WHERE station_id IN (1, 3, 5) AND availability = true
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records, AVG(energy_used) AS average_energy FROM charging_sessions
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT name, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT station_name, location, capacity FROM stations ORDER BY capacity DESC;
SELECT user_id, station_id, start_time, end_time FROM transactions WHERE transaction_id = 100;
SELECT location, availability FROM charging_stations WHERE charging_speed > 50;
SELECT * FROM charging_stations WHERE availability = TRUE;
SELECT station_name, location, capacity FROM stations WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT user_id, name, email FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT start_time, end_time FROM transactions WHERE station_id = 3 ORDER BY start_time ASC;
SELECT location, charging_speed FROM charging_stations JOIN stations ON charging_stations.id = stations.station_id;
